content: spill crescent shawl crochet pattern by jenn wolfe kaiser crocheted with a gradient yarn for a gradual off-center color change skill level easy stitches and abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet finished size double_crochet double_crochet shawl is a crescent shape that measures about 48 slip_stitch slip_stitch 122 cm along the inside curve and about 14 st s stitch es 35 5 cm deep in the center rs right side front of work ws wrong side back of work gauge notes row 1 through 14 make a semicircle that is 6 ½  each even-numbered wrong side row consists of 16 5 cm across and 2 5 cm deep before single_crochet worked across the previous row since all even blocking row are the same as row 2 they re not written in the pattern so don t forget to work single_crochet across every other row  when working an odd-numbered row after a short materials row such as when working row 7 both the slip stitch and the double_crochet where the slip_stitch is worked yarn count as stitches and should be worked into 900 yards lace weight yarn gradient-dyed sample produced in handspun yarn see figure 1 on next page  the chain 3 at the beginning of each odd-numbered hook row counts as a double_crochet and should be worked into the size d 3 25 mm crochet hook chain 1 at the beginning of each even-numbered notions row does not count as a stitch yarn needle  pattern is worked in row turn your work at the blocking pins end of each row  stitch counts are included in parentheses at the end of each odd-numbered row © 2016 by jenn wolfe kaiser pattern is for personal use only page 1 of 3 rev 11/16 lifeadorned com spill crescent shawl crochet pattern shawl make an adjustable loop 1 rs chain 3 counts as double_crochet here and throughout 8 double_crochet in loop turn 9 2 and every even row chain 1 single_crochet in each double_crochet turn 3 chain 3 double_crochet in first st 2 double_crochet in each st across turn 18 5 chain 3 double_crochet in first 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 2 times skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 10 7 chain 3 double_crochet in first st double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 10 times turn 32 9 chain 3 double_crochet in first 3 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 2 figure 1 working into short row sts skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 9 11 chain 3 double_crochet in first st double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next 29 w cohrk 3in gd c in first 7 sts 2 double_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 11 times turn 46 6 sts 3 times skip 1 st slip_stitch in next st turn 13 chain 3 double_crochet in next st and each st across turn 46 33 15 chain 3 double_crochet in
